title: 'I have some gas left in the tank': At 37, Djokovic still has big tennis goals
description: Djokovic has had a rough start to 2025, but shown flashes of brilliance too. And he's aiming for that 100th tour win.
author: Simon Cambers

title: WTA's Dart rues requesting foe 'put on deodorant'
description: Harriet Dart apologized after her 6-0, 6-3 loss at the Rouen Open on Tuesday for saying that her opponent, Lois Boisson, "smells really bad."

title: Dart apologises for asking Boisson to 'put on deodorant'
description: British number four Harriet Dart apologises after asking the umpire to tell her opponent to put on deodorant during her first-round loss at the Rouen Open.

title: Norrie beaten in Barcelona, Alcaraz edges out Quinn
description: British number three Cameron Norrie suffers a first-round exit at the Barcelona Open as he prepares for the start of the French Open this month.

title: Unlock the Perfect Slice Serve - Essential Tennis Podcast #415
description: The wide slice serve is a CRITICAL tool to have in your tool box. It pulls opponents out of position, opens the court up for you to hit into, exposes their usually weaker backhand side, and forces them to run twice as far for the next shot - if they even get it at all. Let’s take a deep dive into how YOU can develop this powerful weapon, step by step in this special episode of the Essential Tennis Podcast.
author: Essential Tennis LLC

title: 3 Djokovic Secrets To Winning More Matches - Essential Tennis Podcast #414
description: In this special episode of the Essential Tennis Podcast, you're going to learn the top 3 tactical secrets of Novak Djokovic that you can apply in your very next match. Use these tools to gain precision, consistency, and offense to make your opponents more uncomfortable, win more points, and win more matches.
author: Essential Tennis LLC

title: What is the Munich tennis schedule?
description: The BMW Open by Bitpanda continues Thursday in Munich. Fourth seed Ugo Humbert and fifth seed Francisco Cerundolo headline the action, with quarter-final places on the line. View Thursday's full order of play below (how to watch).  ORDER OF PLAY - THURSDAY, 17 APRIL 2025 Center Court - start 11:00 David Goffin (BEL) vs. Mariano Navone (ARG) [5] Francisco Cerundolo (ARG) vs. [LL} Alexander Shevchenko (KAZ) Zizou Bergs (BEL) vs. [LL] Diego Dedura-Palomero (GER) [4] Ugo Humbert (FRA) vs. Fabian Marozsan (HUN) Court 1 - start 11:00 Rohan Bopanna (IND) / Ben Shelton (USA) vs. Sander Gille (BEL) / Jan Zielinski (POL) [1] Kevin Krawietz (GER) / Tim Puetz (GER) vs. Sadio Doumbia (FRA) / Fabien Reboul (FRA) [WC] Jakob Schnaitter (GER) / Mark Wallner (GER) vs. Justin Engel (GER) / Max Hans Rehberg (GER) Not Before 17:00 Andre Goransson (SWE) / Sem Verbeek (NED) vs. [Alt] Guido Andreozzi (ARG) / Theo Arribage (FRA) Para Court - start 11:00 [1] Alfie Hewett (GBR) vs. Nicolas Charrier (FRA) [WC] Nico Langmann (AUT) vs. Gaetan Menguy (FRA) Gordon Reid (GBR) vs. [2] Gustavo Fernandez (ARG) Maikel Scheggers (NED) vs. Joachim Gerard (BEL) [NEWSLETTER FORM]

title: What is the Barcelona tennis schedule?
description: Play continues Thursday at the Barcelona Open Banc Sabadell, the ATP 500 event in Spain. Among the players in action will be top seed Carlos Alcaraz, fourth seed Andrey Rublev and fifth seed Alex de Minaur. View Thursday's full order of play below (how to watch).    ORDER OF PLAY - THURSDAY, 17 APRIL 2025 Pista Rafa Nadal - start 11:00 AM Jaume Munar (ESP) vs. Karen Khachanov Alejandro Davidovich Fokina (ESP) vs. [4] Andrey Rublev Not Before 4:00 PM [1] Carlos Alcaraz (ESP) vs. [Q] Laslo Djere (SER) [LL] Jacob Fearnley (GBR) vs. [5] Alex de Minaur (AUS) Pista Andres Gimeno - start 11:00 AM N. title: Alcaraz Wins 2025 Monte Carlo Title
description: Carlos Alcaraz claimed his sixth Masters 1000 crown and first Monte-Carlo title on Sunday, overpowering a fading Lorenzo Musetti 3-6, 6-1, 6-0. The Spaniard weathered a fiery first set from Musetti, but the Italian’s right leg buckled in the third, requiring treatment at 0-3. Alcaraz, clinical as ever, seized the moment, wrapping it up in …
author: Jonathan

title: Monte-Carlo Masters 2025 Day 7 Semi-Final Recap
description: Day 7 at the Rolex Monte-Carlo Masters boiled the tournament down to its final two, with Carlos Alcaraz and Lorenzo Musetti earning their spots in Sunday’s championship match. Alcaraz produced a cleaner display to oust Alejandro Davidovich Fokina in an entertaining 7-6(2), 6-4 clash, overcoming a spraying some forehands and five missed match points to …
author: Jonathan
